squidpony.squidgrid.fov

Interface FOVCell


  • @Beta
public interface FOVCell
    A cell which contains the information needed to process FOV and LOS.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float resistance(java.lang.String key)
      Returns the general resistance to the provided key.
      float resistance(java.lang.String key, DirectionIntercardinal direction)
      Returns the resistance to the provided key to rays passing through the given edge, corner, or center.
      void setFOVResult(java.lang.String key, DirectionIntercardinal direction, float value)
      Allows the FOV algorithm to store the result of its computations directly into the relevant cell.
      void setFOVResult(java.lang.String key, float value)
      Allows the FOV algorithm to store the result of its computations directly into the relevant cell.

      • resistance

        float resistance(java.lang.String key,
                 DirectionIntercardinal direction)
        Returns the resistance to the provided key to rays passing through the given edge, corner, or center. If the Direction is NONE, then the cell's overall translucency is used.
        Parameters:
        key -
        direction -
        Returns:
